thread.title: Lewis Fowler Recognized as one of America’s Fastest-Growing Companies
thread.title_full: Lewis Fowler Recognized as one of America’s Fastest-Growing Companies

author: Chuck Miller
title: Lewis Fowler Recognized as one of America’s Fastest-Growing Companies
text:
Recognizing top-performing private companies, editors at Inc. announced Lewis Fowler as one of the 5000 fastest-growing companies in America . This announcement also comes off the heels of recently being named a 2015 Colorado Company to Watch , recognizing Lewis Fowler for their work in the private sector as well as their active support of local charities and philanthropic causes. Founded in 2002, Lewis Fowler is a leading management consulting firm that specializes in helping large enterprises realize strategies through best in class program and project management execution. Lewis Fowler is a trusted partner for many Fortune 500 clients in aerospace/defense, oil & gas/energy, and commercial enterprises.
“We are honored to be announced as one of America’s fastest-growing companies by Inc.” said Managing Partner, Kevin Lewis. “This recognition serves as testament to the entire Lewis Fowler team and their passionate commitment to deliver value for our clients each and every day.” Expanding on these comments, Managing Partner, Amy Fowler Stadler, added: “Our rapid growth is a direct result of our team’s ability to help our clients realize their strategic objectives. At our core is a great team, and at Lewis Fowler, we believe we have the best in the business.”
The Inc. 5000 is ranked according to percentage of revenue growth over a four-year period. To be considered for this recognition, companies must be based in the United States, privately held, and not a subsidiary of other companies. This year’s Inc. 5000 conference and award gala is being held October 21 – 23 in Orlando, FL.
About Lewis Fowler
A trusted partner for Fortune 500 companies, Lewis Fowler has an established track record of delivering innovative solutions that help realize corporate strategies. Founded in 2002 and headquartered in Englewood, Lewis Fowler is a management consulting firm that provides best in class program and project execution for enterprise level companies. Lewis Fowler’s expert team aligns people, process, and technology to implement strategy and build sustainable value for their clients. Learn more about Lewis Fowler at http://www.lewisfowler.com
